name: Tanner Rodriguez, D.C.
text: Wow! What an incredible menu! So much to choose from including Mexican & American dishes that will definitely leave you satisfied! If you leave hungry, itâ€™s your own fault!

name: Jesse Markham
text: Authentic Mexican cuisine with American classic American service.

name: Joe Anthony Cerda, Sr.
text: Great food and service. Quiet atmosphere. Good prices.

name: John Mark Pool
text: If you're passing through Cross Plains, Texas or a hunter near their annually, you owe it to yourself to stop at this "made from scratch" hole-in-the-wall Tez-Mex

name: Alfred Randy
text: A surprising stop. Great food.

name: Len Hobbs
text: Rosa is a very well trained waitress, the coffee is the best within 100 miles, the pancakes and crepes are 'lush'...and the Crazy Burrito...is flavorful, filling and cheap (add Avacados!) â€¦More

name: Bill Nash
text: Always try to stop there when in cross plains, Betty,her sister,an staff always treat me good,food is excellent,no complaints, everybody needs to try.

name: Selena Golden
text: The worst Mexican food ever I will never come here again and the waitresses were talking about the customers in Spanish since most of them only spoke English

name: Pam Hicks
text: We were traveling through and decided to stop. This was an excellent meal. Friendly staff.

name: John Castilaw
text: Good food, large portions on the plates for a decent price to be in a small town

name: Johnny Moore
text: Good food good service good prices the place is always clean

name: Linda Barnett
text: Every one works there is very good because they listen closely on each word you tell them and they are  excellent!!!

name: Eddie Talent
text: Food was good, feeling, and service was friendly and fast.

name: Harold Dixon
text: Absolutely small town great, slow pace, good beautiful service!

name: Hope Vitaliano
text: Such amazing delicious food, with great service.

name: karan ireland
text: Nacho supreme is soo good.

name: Doug Dugger
text: Good service and good food.  Breakfast is available all day

name: Chelsea Gartman
text: Love their chips and salsa

name: Kenneth
text: Great menu! Great staff!  Allowed my party to eat and visit with an old friend longer than we should have and were very cordial about  it. Thank you.

name: Bobby Abbott
text: Nice small town place to eat. Quite atmosphere, good fresh food and good service. Very reasonable prices leaves room for gratuity.

name: Jessica Kirkland
text: Nice little place with good food. I got chicken fajitas and salad as a side.

name: Bryan Kenyon
text: Great place to eat in Cross Plains Texas.  I'll diffently be back!! Thank you for the good food and service!!

name: Ricky Drake
text: I really enjoyed their cheeseburgers french fries and it looks like they had a lot more amazing stuff on the menu stop in and try it for yourself

name: Deborah Anderson
text: They serve the best authentic Mexican food in the area. Being from El Paso we get real authentic Mexican food a lot but this place is as good as the Mexican our maid used to make for us in El Paso! Their food is awesome! We travel from Brownwood just to eat here.

name: Manda Holcomb
text: It is AMAZING food for a small town. The waitress was AMAZING and knew my aunt on a personal level like she was her own family. The waitress is Betty. (I think that was her name) she was amazing and super sweet

name: Kathy Waddell
text: Good food, fair prices, and friendly staff. Worth the stop.

name: Juan Carlos Urquidi
text: Real flavor

name: Howard's House
text: It was ok but small. The tartar sauce wasnt for me. Very diff and small pieces of catfish not filets heavily heavily breaded in corn meal. My hub had huevos rancheros and the corn tortillas were like rock hard. We got our food to go and wont be going back.

name: Artist2live2 Love
text: Whereâ€™s the cheese? Their cheese enchiladas were full of cheese back when I live here and I ate there weekly. I came in for a visit with my sister. She placed an order to go. My enchiladas tasted like corn tortilla because of so little â€¦More

name: LISA FLOYD
text:
Love the food, the servers are sometimes not so friendly.
The food is always made fresh & delicious.  ðŸ˜ƒ

name: Bob Wyatt
text: Delicious food and friendly staff.

text: The food was very good and the service was very good also !

text: Absolutely great!! Fast service, curtious waitress and the food was delicious!!

name: Jane Eichholtz
text: Very good Mexican food for a tiny town in the middle of no where

name: Michelle Jensen
text: Highly recommend the street tacos with brisket!

name: Reinier Vega
text: Nice staff and very good food.

name: Michele R
text: Pleasantly surprised by the many options and amazing taste.

name: Leslie Courington
text: Really liked all the different meat selections: steak, chicken, beef fajitas, and fried fish. Salad bar had a good selection as did the dessert bar; I didn't eat anything on those. There were some Mexican food selections but I was not fast enough to get them. The chili rellenos looked great though.

name: Krystal Annette
text: Really good food!! And the owners are awesome!! I recommend asking for Ashley as you're waitress, she's amazing. Unfortunately some of the younger waitress are horrible, they seemed to get the job just because they are family are related to â€¦More

name: JAMES DENNIS
text: Food was good. They were very busy. Saw a roach on the wall. Stingy with tortillas.

name: Carolyn Streety
text: Very generic food. Nothing really stands out and service could be better.

name: Jamie D
text: Kelsey Smith was our waitress, we sat in the back room and she was one of the best waitresses you can ask for. VERY attentive but not even noticeable or obnoxious almost like she knew when to ask what when we needed her to. You cant do wrong with her as ur waitress and the food is very fresh and great.

name: Justin Sharbutt

name: Tania Sim
text: Iâ€™ve never had a positive experience eating here out of the 3 times Iâ€™ve been here. The service and food sucks. My meal has always been undercooked and the wait staff never checks in to see if the foods okay or if drinks need to be refilled. I would not recommend this place- Dine elsewhere

name: Mark Sides
text: Sunday buffet is awesome, a very good selection both on salad bar and steam table.  Definately more reasonably priced than Golden Corral, with better quality.  Service is good.  This is a good place to bring the family.

name: Howard Bodenhamer
text: Great food, excellent service and prices.  Have stopped here many times.  Chrystal is a charming and gracious hostess.

name: jason english
text: Green chili sauce to die for.. all the food  is wonderful.  Staff friendly

name: Charles Bennett
text: I was with friends here to eat. One of them ordered something with peanut butter on it, they was out of peanut butter, the waitress went above and beyond next. She went to a store across the street and brought back peanut butter. Wow, place cares for its customers, I shall return

name: Cliff Wydel
text: Good place to eat

name: Susan Fletcher

name: Gaye Botts
